customer_reviews.title: Changed ingredients: super pore clogging
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product up until my last purchase the first week of December. Apparently, Bumble and Bumble decided to switch up the ingredients list to add a bunch of pore clogging agents that make it impossible for me to use this anymore. I’m upset about it too, because it truly is moisturizing. But for those of us with sensitive skin, it no longer works. Not sure why they had to fix something that wasn’t broken.
customer_reviews.author: Nat S.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Ive used Bumble & bumble super rich conditioner for years! This bottle that I got is not the same ingredients or something. This conditioner always left my hair slick and smooth. This bottle that I got leaves a waxy texture that doesn’t ever rinse out and never untangles my hair. This product is either a knock off product or expired or they change their ingredients or something it’s awful what a waste of money. I’d have to say it’s worse then Pantene pro v.

customer_reviews.title: A Conditioner that Doesn't Leave Your Hair Limp
customer_reviews.text: I have been a long-time fan of Bumble and Bumble hair products, but every now and then I'll try some new brand of hair care products. Conditioners are usually too watery (and completely ineffective) or too dense, leaving my hair feeling coated with gunk. And I usually end-up tossing the other stuff and going right back to this conditioner. I have medium, straight hair and not too dry, not too oily and this product works extremely well for my hair. The big bonus, you don't need a heaping handful - a lil' dab will do ya just fine. And it smells nice; clean and simple, not like a tropical drink or cheap perfume. It's a really high-quality product.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy it is a fake
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in 2010. I realize that was two years ago and something was just strange about it. I couldn't put my finger on it. I figured it was from Amazon so they wouldn't allow a vendor to sell something that wasn't the authentic product. I was wrong. I recently bought a bottle from the salon and was able to compare the difference. Whoever was scamming everyone was using handsoap (white) I want to say softsoap in the shampoo container. I haven't figured out what was in the conditioner but it is definitely a fake.

customer_reviews.title: Great conditioner!
customer_reviews.text: This conditioner is the perfect conditioner! I have very fine hair that gets tangled easily. Despite wearing my hair long, this conditioner really keeps it soft and tangle-free. The gentle shampoo by Bumble and Bumble pairs with it extremely well, as does the thickening shampoo (but this shampoo dries out your hair if used every day). Take note: if you order it on the Bumble and Bumble website, you don't pay shipping for orders over $50. I highly recommend this conditioner. Worth the money, and lasts a long time when you buy the large, value bottle.
